directions.step:
Combine flour, oats, sugar, soda and salt in a large bowl; blend well. Add butter and vanilla; mix well until crumbly. Reserve 1 cup of mixture.
Press remaining crumb mixture into a greased 13X9 pan. Spread apricot preserves on crust to within 1/4" of edge. Sprinkle with reserved crumb mixture and coconut. Bake at 350F for 20-25 min, or until lightly browned. Cool and cut into 24 bars.
Per serving: 164 Calories; 7g Fat (40% calories from fat); 2g Protein; 23g Carbohydrate; 16mg Cholesterol; 118mg Sodium
